entry.title: Saturday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Showers or periods of drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
